form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Naturalization and Citizenship Application Form N-4,, N-658963.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/27/2023 20. If beneficiary is in the United States, give the following information concerning beneficiary (a) Last arrived in U.S. as (b) Date beneficiary's stay expired or will (c) Beneficiary's File number (Visitor, student. exchange alien, crewman, stowaway, etc ) on expire as shown on his Form 1-94 or 1-95. if any (Month) (Day) (Year) (Month) (Day) (Year) A- (d) Name and address of beneficiary's present employer Self-employed October 21 $ 1938 stap-Haitien 2. If you are a citizen of the United States, give the following the (e) Date beneficiary began this -- Plantation OWN employment 1937 1. I was born: (Month) (Day) (Year) in: (Town or cign (State or Province) (Country) Haiti Citizenship was acquired: (Check one) 119 through birth in the U.S through pare/us through naturalization through marriage (1) If acquired through naturalization give name under which naturalized or name used prior to naturalization, if different from your present name, number of naturalization certificate and date and place of naturalization: 10658963 June 29, 1977 Miami, Florida (2) If known, my former alien registration number was A FOIA (b)(6) (3) If acquired through parentage or marriage, have you obtained a certificate of citizenship in your own name? (a) If so, give number of certificate and date and place of issuance: (b) 11 not. submit evidence of citizenship in accordance with instruction 3 a (2) HOTEL 23. If you are a lawful permanent resident alien of the United States, give the following: N/A a. Alien Registration Number b. Date, place, and means of admission for lawful permanent residence A- 24 this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Names of your prior spouses c. Names of spouse's prior spouses 25. My residence in the United States is: (C/O, if appropriate) (Apt. No.) (Number and Street) (Town or city) (State) (ZIP Code) 455 N. No.) (Number and street) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) 33-23-71 Street - Jackson Heights New-York 11372 4-1965 1974 28. If this petition is for a child, (a). is the child married? (b). is the child your adopted child? If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state. N/A C 2. IVAT X 29. If this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? N/A If not, submit a separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent. 30. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives. give names of each and relationship to petitioner. FOIA (b)(6) 31. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? NO If so, give place and date of filing and result. bEB 32.
